name: Hits 'n Giggles
description:
Hits 'n Giggles is a super-brief text based choose-your-own adventure style game.

This isn't intended to go anywhere, but this was what I made for practice purposes when beginning learning some C++. 

I don't plan on doing anything else with this, but I wanted a place to share it as I begin development on something real.

I'm sure this is tasteless. I've grown a lot since school, but I suppose warning that this may be at least a little inappropriate and juvenile. Please don't hold it against me!

Have fun, hope you enjoy!
